amendment.description: Amendment reduces the amount made available for the greening of the Capitol project by $1.5 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 108 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the account for greening of the Capitol by $1.5 million and to increase the reduction in legislative expenses by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
